content.en: Pest identification: Scientists are exploring the use of deep learning algorithms, such as deep convolutional neural networks and YOLOv4, to quickly and accurately identify pests in agriculture and forestry. These algorithms are being trained on large-scale datasets of agricultural pests and are able to detect pests in various conditions, including noncontrolled environments. By using these advanced algorithms, researchers hope to improve pest monitoring and ultimately increase agricultural productivity.
content.da: Skadedyrsidentifikation: Forskere undersøger brugen af dybe læringsalgoritmer, såsom dybe konvolutionelle neurale netværk og YOLOv4, til hurtigt og præcist at identificere skadedyr i landbrug og skovbrug. Disse algoritmer bliver trænet på store datasæt af landbrugsskadedyr og er i stand til at opdage skadedyr under forskellige forhold, herunder ukontrollerede miljøer. Ved at bruge disse avancerede algoritmer håber forskere at forbedre skadedyrsmonitorering og ultimativt øge landbrugsproduktiviteten.
